name: Café Aroma Berlin
description: Welcome to Café Aroma Berlin, a cozy neighborhood gem in Weißensee. Founded by Eric Denegri, a trained chef from Peru, we bring you premium Peruvian coffee, delicious pastries, and a warm family-friendly atmosphere. Our café combines international flavors with a welcoming Berlin spirit.

owner.name: Eric Jair Denegri Briceno
owner.background: Trained chef from Peru, immigrated to Berlin at age 18. Previously operated 'Jarú' Peruvian street food brand.
